text: shares audio content about life and learning that takes place on campus and around the world. This content is embeddable into third-party sites and can be used to accompany news stories.

HPAC maintains a high-quality ISDN connection and broadcast-quality audio studio that Harvard faculty, staff, and students can use for radio interviews with national and international media. For scheduling, technical details, and more information, please email
